Today was a happy, but also sad day for Cranberry Middle. We celebrated Mrs. Anne Avery Foster's retirement after 18+ years of teaching and 24+ in the system! We celebrated Mrs. Adele Byrd's move to the high school in the EC department for next year! Last but not least, we celebrated Mr. Ricky Ward's move to Avery High School as their new Principal for next year! The staff kindly "roasted" each one. It seemed like everyone had a great time, but there was a lot of wet faces in the group.

Cranberry Middle is a family. We just hope that those that come to be with us, and those who have to leave us feel welcomed while they are here and missed when they are gone.

We love you all and wish nothing but the best for each of you in your future adventures! You will ALWAYS be Wildcats!!!!!

This is one of the most meaningful events we host each year and this year we were able to honor 30+ Veterans with a beautiful ceremony filled with patriotic songs, patriotic essays, and our special speaker this year was Pastor Bob Garland from Crossnore Baptist. It was a wonderful morning and we thank all who took part!
